title: about gifting
body: A friend of mine cant gift me, because we aren't friends for a long time. Do you know the time and why do we have this?

replies.body: Two weeks is the minimum. :] Kao posted a super helpful link below with the FAQ for gifting!

You have to be friends with someone for 2 weeks. This is to prevent someone from gaining access to your account, adding themselves, then gifting themselves things on your account. Here is Riot's [FAQs on gifting](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/23111872-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ).
